attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent to a child from overseas I am opposed to the fee increase
to the I-600 petition to adopt an orphan overseas.

I am recommending that the
fees for adoption should be held as is because, for
many of us, we have to file TWICE because the
approval is only good for 18 months. With
adoptions taking longer and longer, most
of us have to file again as the UCIS do not
permit us to renew our filing. They
make us pay the full price again!

We already spend thousands of dollars to bring our kids home and our own
government should not be increasing that burden.

Thank you
Laurie
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Laurie Burns
